text: Kicksled is a vehicle that is used in winter time. The kicksled was invented in 1800s in Sweden.The first known description of a kicksled comes from the town of in Piteå in Northern Sweden in 1872. Kicksleds are common in Sweden, Norway and Finland, and can only be used on hard, icy surfaces. ==References== == Other websites == * guide * Spark meg bak! Om sparkens historie (2012) at the Norøsterdalsmuseet Category:Land transport
title: Kicksled
